metadata.title: RHSA-2024:2733: Red Hat OpenStack Platform 17.1 (openstack-ansible-core) security update (Moderate)
metadata.description:
An ansible-core rebuild for OpenStack based on python 3.9.

Security Fix(es):

* HTML attribute injection when passing user input as keys to xmlattr
filter (CVE-2024-22195)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS
score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE
page listed in the References section.

bugzilla.text: jinja2: HTML attribute injection when passing user input as keys to xmlattr filter

platform: Red Hat OpenStack Platform 17.1 for RHEL 9

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 is installed
openstack-ansible-core is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
